pull_requests.title: Correct a translation error.
pull_requests.body:
I have found two problems.
1. the translation "Gluon数据集提供的`transform_first`函数" can be difficult to understand. If the reader does not think carefully, they will not realise that this function is a method of the `Dataset` class, but rather that one of the datasets of `Gluon` contains this function.
2. "即图像顶部的元素" is obviously a wrong translation, it means "i.e. the element at the top of the image.".

pull_requests.title: fix typo and improve translation in chapter_linear-networks\softmax-egression.md
pull_requests.body:
原文为“training objective”， 被译为“训练目标”，改为“训练的目标函数”

原文为“Note that the softmax operation does not change the ordering among the logits $\mathbf{o}$,”，
译为 “softmax运算不会改变未规范化的预测$\mathbf{o}$之间的顺序” ，
“ordering” 改为 “softmax运算不会改变未规范化的预测$\mathbf{o}$之间的大小次序”。

其他修改为尽量不改变原意的情况下改进翻译的可读性。
